title: Building a Reasoning Model from Scratch
description: How to teach a small language model to think step-by-step using reinforcement learning with verifiable rewards -- from SFT on chain-of-thought data to GRPO training to distillation.

notebooks.title: Chain-of-Thought Supervised Fine-Tuning
notebooks.objective: Understand the SFT stage of reasoning model training: build chain-of-thought data, implement next-token prediction loss, and fine-tune a small model to produce reasoning traces.

notebooks.title: GRPO from Scratch
notebooks.objective: Implement Group Relative Policy Optimization from scratch: group-relative advantages, clipped surrogate loss, and KL penalty for training reasoning models.

notebooks.title: Training a Reasoning Model End-to-End
notebooks.objective: Put the full pipeline together: SFT warm-up followed by GRPO training on GSM8K math problems, observing emergent reasoning behaviors.

notebooks.title: Emergent Reasoning Behaviors and Distillation
notebooks.objective: Explore emergent behaviors (self-verification, backtracking, extended thinking) and implement rejection sampling distillation to transfer reasoning to smaller models.

caseStudy.title: Teaching an Insurance Claims Engine to Reason Step by Step
caseStudy.subtitle: ClearClaim AI -- Building a Verifiable Reasoning Model for Multi-Step Claims Adjudication
caseStudy.industry: Insurance Technology -- Property and Casualty Claims
caseStudy.description: ClearClaim AI's LLM-based claims engine achieves only 69% accuracy on multi-step claims, costing carrier clients $2.8M/year. This case study applies the full reasoning model pipeline (SFT + GRPO with verifiable rewards + distillation) to build an auditable claims reasoning system that exceeds 85% accuracy while meeting regulatory explainability requirements.

curator.name: Dr. Rajat Dandekar
curator.title: Course Instructor
curator.bio: Dr. Rajat Dandekar is a researcher and educator specializing in AI/ML, with a passion for making complex concepts accessible through intuitive explanations and hands-on learning.
